name: cookie-policy
description: A cookie policy banner for your site

scripts.build: browserify -d -e index.js -o es5/cookie-policy.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-object-assign ] ]
scripts.standalone: browserify -d -e index.js -s CookiePolicy -o es5/cookie-policy-standalone.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-object-assign ] ]
scripts.watch: watchify index.js -s CookiePolicy -o es5/cookie-policy-standalone.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-object-assign ] ]
scripts.compile: npm run build && npm run standalone

author: Zander Martineau
